entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
